oai_dc:dc.dc:title: List of items purchased and prices September 1865
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This is a list of items purchased and prices paid dated September 20, 1865. The list was created by David Dotson or his wife Matlida. David was a Confederate veteran from Grainger County, Tennessee who lost part of a foot at the Battle of Franklin and became a prisoner of war. He returned home after the war. Items listed inlclude fabric, shoes, hoop skirts, pins and bobs. Dotson served in Co. K, 37th Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA. See also (davi108).
